title: The Old Guard
description: A group of immortal warriors secretly protect humanity but face danger when their existence is exposed.
cast: Charlize Theron, KiKi Layne, Marwan Kenzari, Matthias Schoenaerts
producer: David Ellison, Dana Goldberg, Don Granger, Charlize Theron

title: Superman
description: A reboot of the Superman story following a young Clark Kent embracing his role as Earth’s protector.
cast: David Corenswet, Rachel Brosnahan, Nicholas Hoult

title: Thunderbolts*
description: A government-assembled team of reformed villains takes on dangerous missions.
cast: Florence Pugh, Sebastian Stan, David Harbour, Hannah John-Kamen

title: A Minecraft Movie
description: A group of real-world teenagers are transported into the Minecraft universe and must survive to return home.
cast: Jason Momoa, Jack Black, Emma Myers

title: Five Feet Apart
description: Two teens with cystic fibrosis fall in love but must maintain physical distance for health reasons.
cast: Haley Lu Richardson, Cole Sprouse

title: Trolls
description: A happy troll princess teams up with a grumpy outsider to save their friends from the Bergens.
cast: Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake

title: Trolls World Tour
description: Poppy and Branch discover different musical troll tribes and must stop rock trolls from taking over.
cast: Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake

title: Trolls Band Together
description: Branch reunites with his long-lost brothers to rescue one of them from pop-star villains.
cast: Anna Kendrick, Justin Timberlake, Troye Sivan

title: Home
description: A misfit alien befriends a human girl and together they go on a journey to save Earth.
cast: Jim Parsons, Rihanna, Steve Martin

title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
description: A magazine writer tries to drive a man away in 10 days while he tries to make her fall in love.
cast: Kate Hudson, Matthew McConaughey

title: The Kissing Booth
description: A teenager's secret romance with her best friend’s older brother creates conflict and drama.
cast: Joey King, Jacob Elordi, Joel Courtney

title: The Kissing Booth 2
description: Elle navigates college decisions, long-distance love, and a new potential crush.
cast: Joey King, Jacob Elordi, Joel Courtney

title: Pretty Woman
description: A wealthy businessman hires an escort for social events and ends up falling in love with her.
cast: Richard Gere, Julia Roberts, Héctor Elizondo, Ralph Bellamy, Laura San Giacomo
producer: Arnon Milchan, Steven Reuther, Charles Minsky

title: Crazy Rich Asians
description: An American-born Chinese professor travels to Singapore and discovers her boyfriend's family is extraordinarily wealthy, testing her comfort with high society.
cast: Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan, Michelle Yeoh, Awkwafina, Ken Jeong
producer: Nina Jacobson, Brad Simpson, John Penotti

title: Set It Up
description: Two overworked assistants scheme to set up their demanding bosses with each other so they can have more time off.
cast: Zoey Deutch, Glen Powell, Lucy Liu, Taye Diggs

title: Sixteen Candles
description: A teenage girl feels ignored on her 16th birthday because her family is too preoccupied with her sister’s wedding.
cast: Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, John Hughes

title: When Harry Met Sally…
description: Two friends explore over many years whether men and women can ever just be friends—or whether attraction will always complicate things.
cast: Billy Crystal, Meg Ryan, Carrie Fisher

title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
description: A heartbroken man goes on vacation to recover, only to find that his ex and her new boyfriend are staying at the same resort.
cast: Jason Segel, Kristen Bell, Mila Kunis, Russell Brand

title: Clueless
description: A wealthy high school student plays matchmaker for her friends, but realizes she might be better off finding love herself.
cast: Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Paul Rudd, Brittany Murphy

title: Coming to America
description: An African prince travels undercover to the U.S. to find a woman who loves him for himself, not his title.
cast: Eddie Murphy, Arsenio Hall, James Earl Jones, Shari Headley

title: 13 Going on 30
description: A teenager mysteriously wakes up as her 30-year-old self and has to figure out who she wants to be.
cast: Jennifer Garner, Mark Ruffalo

title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
description: A Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek man, and navigates the quirks of her very traditional family when they approve of their marriage.
cast: Nia Vardalos, John Corbett, Michael Constantine
producer: Tom Hanks, Rita Wilson, Gary Goetzman

title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception—planting an idea into someone's subconscious.
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy

title: Hotel Transylvania
description: Dracula runs a hotel for monsters but panics when a human discovers it and falls for his daughter.
cast: Adam Sandler, Selena Gomez, Andy Samberg

title: Princess Diaries
description: A shy American teenager discovers she's the heir to a European kingdom.
cast: Anne Hathaway, Julie Andrews
